text: The floating bundle trigger is visible and the inline bundle composer drawer is open with #inlineBundleSave ready and the toast pattern mounted (#toastStack, #toastLiveRegion, #toastTemplate).
The admin clicks #inlineBundleSave and the saveInlineBundle call resolves successfully.

A success toast fires via the shared toast stack in #toastStack, announced through #toastLiveRegion, includes the bundle name in the message, and auto-dismisses after the default duration while staying keyboard dismissible.

testBehaviors: Success/info toasts auto-dismiss after defaultDurationMs unless pinned
Dismiss controls stay keyboard accessible without moving focus
